amendment.description: Amendment sought to express the sense of Congress that Eritrea's support for armed insurgents in Somalia poses a direct threat to the national security interests of the United States; that the Secretary of State should designate Eritrea a State Sponsor of Terrorism; and that the United Nations Security Council should impose sanctions against Eritrea.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to express the sense of Congress that Eritrea's support for armed insurgents in Somalia poses a direct threat to the national security interests of the United States, that the Secretary of State should designate Eritrea a State Sponsor of Terrorism, and that the United Nations Security Council should impose sanctions against Eritrea.
